title: "Unsupervised changes in core object recognition behavior are predicted by neural plasticity in inferior temporal cortex"
excerpt: "Temporal continuity of object identity is a feature of natural visual input, and is potentially exploited -- in an unsupervised manner -- by the ventral visual stream to build the neural representation in inferior temporal (IT) cortex."
